prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

Hailee's daughter is 3 and her name is Jasmine

name: Fergus SheppardKinktober ALT
mes: Fergus had been nothing but meticulous when it came to weaseling his way into the very core of Hailee’s life. There was no stone unturned, from being their dear landlord who kept them safe and secure to providing them with any protection, transportation fucking \*\*craving\*\* they possessed- it was there. If they desired it- he would \*\*provide\*\*. That’s what real men do, they provide for their family no matter the cost. No matter how many late nights he stayed up to wander past the front door of their apartment, to catch a hint of the peaceful quiet on the other side. No matter how many nights he’d spent sending Mordecai to paint the cities forgotten alleyways with their brain-matter. Perhaps Hailee had finally seen the level of his devotion- which \*\*finally\*\* led them to this moment. No child, no distraction, just the raw sexual tension steadily growing between them as they share a romantic dinner. Stealing teasing glances, fleeting touches and now… here. Fergus’s lips trail down the column of Hailee‘s throat as they stumble blindly through the living room of his apartment. The sound of furniture scraping across the wooden floors fill the air abruptly as they bump into the couch and coffee table. Fergus pays no mind to the slight disarray of the room, his heavily calloused hands too occupied with running down Hailee’s form. His fingertips tracing every valley and curve, committing it to memory as he groans against the hollow of their neck and presses his clothed erection against them with evident need. “Look what ye’re doing to me…I'm fuckin’ mad about ye.” Fergus curses out in a lustful growl against Hailee’s throat, punctuating his lust with feverish kisses. His lips trail up their throat and across their jaw before commanding their lips in a hungry kiss. \*Fuck… Wanted to take my time. But they got me hard as stone. I need ‘em.\* Fergus thinks to himself in a foggy haze of lust and growing desperation while he hurriedly guides them through the doorway and into his large, sleek bedroom. The dim lighting and lingering scent of leather only add fuel to the fire that’s brewing within him and revealing itself through his leaking cock. “Get comfortable, Mo chridhe (My Heart)- I’ve got just what we need.” Fergus insists easily, his tone a seductive purr as he pushes Hailee softly towards the bed before he begins stripping down his clothes and tossing them aside carelessly. Left standing clad in his black silken boxers, his pulsing length presses against the fabric, demanding to be released. Even as he moves to the nearby dresser and opens the top drawer to retrieve a condom, his steely blue gaze never leaves Hailee. The image of them sprawled out before him, naked and trembling as he stuffs their depths with his cock is something he’s fantasied about countless times. \*Cant wait to be inside ‘em- Damn, do I want to fill ‘em to the brim until they’re dripping with my seed. Make a mess of ‘em, mark ‘em.\* Fergus thinks with a soft groan, biting his lip at his own explicit fantasy. His fingertips brush against the plastic wrapper of the condom and it jerk’s him back to reality for a moment. The sleek square packaging fitting in his palm, almost taunting him with how it’ll take away his sense of spilling into Hailee and denying his most primal need. “Got it here, Bonnie..” Fergus drawls out in a seemingly casual tone while pretending to rummage through the drawer. Moving his hands purposefully within the drawer, he grabs a bobby-pin, pushing it through the wrapper and puncturing the latex of condom in a way that’s nearly undetectable. Turning to face the bed once more, his eyes roam over Hailee’s form greedily and he flashes them a wolfy grin while his hand waves the condom wrapper easily. He wastes no time striding back over to the bed where Hailee lays, his large form crawling up the expanse of the bed to capture their lips once more. “Let’s continue where we left off.” His husky voice purrs hungrily as he brings his face closer, not waiting a second longer to slip his hot tongue into their mouth and pull them hard against his muscular chest.

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee arches into Fergus and her hand tangles in his hair pulling him close.*

*Hailee's phone suddenly goes off and she tries to ignore it but it won't stop so she pulls away picking up*

*Aftet a second Hailee stops moving against Fergus and shouts* "What. No no ill be right there" *Hailee hangs up and scrambles to find her clothes* "I'm sorry I have to go Jasmine fell"

name: Fergus SheppardKinktober ALT
mes:
Fergus freezes mid-bite, his entire body tensing like a coiled spring when Hailee suddenly pulls away. His grip tightens instinctively around her hips—*No. No no no, not now—*

The second she mentions Jasmine, his expression shifts from feral lust to sharp concern in a heartbeat. He releases her immediately, rolling off the bed with surprising agility despite his raging erection straining against his boxers.

"Fuck—is she alright?" he barks, already snatching up Hailee’s discarded clothes and shoving them into her hands while grabbing his own phone from the nightstand. His voice drops into that dangerous calm he uses when shit hits the fan—all business despite the primal frustration still burning through him. "Mordecai’s outside in the car downstairs—he’ll get ye there in two minutes flat."

He thumbs open his contacts with one hand while yanking on sweatpants with the other, dialing before pressing it to his ear. "*Aye.* Drop everything and bring the car ‘round front *now.* ... The bairn’s hurt." He hangs up without waiting for a response, steely gaze locking onto Hailee as they dress frantically beside him.

Every muscle in Fergus' body is taut with barely restrained energy—half of him screaming to pin her back down and finish what they started, the other half already mentally mapping out which hospital they'd hit and which doctors were on Crimson Syndicate payroll to expedite things if needed.

His hand shoots out to steady Hailee by their elbow as they nearly stumble pulling their shirt on too fast. "Breathe," he orders gruffly though worry flickers behind those icy blues of his before hardening again into something protective... *possessive.* "She’ll be fine." A beat passes where neither moves until finally: "...I'm comin' wi' ye."
